price: Dan Dia telah menundukkan matahari dan bulan bagimu yang terus menerus beredar (dalam orbitnya); dan telah menundukkan malam dan siang bagimu.
arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ دَآئِبَيۡنِۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wasakhara lakumu al-shamsa wal-qamara dāibayni wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahāra
